name: ./Gray/Projects/
body:
# Welcome to Gray's Page.

## Contact  Info
> [Gray's LinkedIn](http://www.linkedin.com/pub/guangyu-gray-wang/48/6ab/101)  
Phone: +1 (226) 988-3558  
Email: guangyu.wangg@yahoo.com


## Personal Projects

### REAL-TIME-TRAINS
![](https://www.student.cs.uwaterloo.ca/~cs452/img/trains.jpg)
Worked in a team of 2 to create an operating system for a system-on-a-chip and
programed model trains to perform tasks based on the developed OS.  
[[Repo]->Real-Time-Train](https://github.com/guangyuwangg/REAL-TIME-TRAINS)  

### Tic-Tac-Toe
![](http://i.imgur.com/05026Zx.jpg?1?7269)  
A Tic-Tac-Toe game developed on Android by using the MVC architecture. Allow
two users to play the game and users can enter their names in the main screen to
identify themselves.  
[[Repo]->Tic-Tac-Toe](https://github.com/guangyuwangg/TicTacToe)

### Patternizer
![](http://i.imgur.com/tme7Ji7.png?1?3035)  
A small program implemented using Java. It can be used to create different kinds of patterns. Demo video provided by my prof: https://www.youtube.com/embed/qNdm6IZrbbg 
My program behaves exactly the same as the demo video does.  
[[Repo]->Patternizer](https://github.com/guangyuwangg/Patternizer)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
